name: BackroomsVR
description:
(THIS GAME IS IN BETA AND WILL BE CONTINUOUSLY UPDATED IN THE COMMING WEEKS) 

You have been working as a researcher at the Async facility for years, but when suddenly one of your friends and collogue goes missing on a routine research tour of the backrooms you must go in alone to find any shred of evidence you can to prove their still alive. Collect five of their journal pages to bring back to Async so a full recovery mission can be conducted and they can be brought back. 

This games level are procedurally generated so each time you play the environment will be different try your hardest not to get lost forever and be driven mad by the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz.
